alert.note: Alert for Canadian; Kingfisher; Logan; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 7:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Kingfisher, Oklahoma, southern Logan and northeastern Canadian Counties through 800 AM CDT... At 730 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dover to near Piedmont to near Oklahoma City. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oklahoma City, Edmond, Midwest City, Del City, Guthrie, Yukon, Bethany, Choctaw, Warr Acres, The Village, Piedmont, Harrah, Spencer, Nichols Hills, Jones, Nicoma Park, Crescent, Luther, Cashion, and Cedar Valley. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 129 and 164. Interstate 40 between mile markers 136 and 138. Interstate 44 between mile markers 121 and 149. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
